vibesExplanation:
The workout video titled "13 min Breathwork & Meditation Practice | Pranayama Techniques | Stress & Anxiety Relief" primarily embodies the vibe of "The Zen Flow" with a score of 0.9. This is supported by the emphasis on grounding and calming effects mentioned in the description, as well as the focus on breath-centered practices integral to a slow-flow and meditative workout. The explicit mention of pranayama and yoga for stress relief indicates a grounding and intentional practice, confirming the correlation. Additionally, user comments frequently mention feelings of relaxation and mental clarity, further supporting this classification.

The video also fits the vibe of "The Deep Recharge" with a score of 0.7, given its purpose of providing stress and anxiety relief, focusing on breathwork, and the mentions in comments about feeling relaxed and using it as a recovery from injury. This aligns with the vibe characterized by nervous system reset and ultra-gentle movement. The shorter duration and the nature of the practice enhance this classification.
